body: Weird way to say it, but i.e. the art here is a subtle godmode.

I have this weird fixation that's sated by this manga. I love how the girls' stomachs look in the panels. The subtle details and curves when contorted in different lewd positions make them feel nicely flat, but soft and curvy at the same time. It's really good, and the way their clothes get raised slightly high enough by chance to tease it out while even getting grabbed on at times... it's just so alluring. It's a small detail, probably not that lewd, but it's so hot I just can't help it. Glob bonk me now =~='
関谷老师的作品太喜欢了！
